name: Turbican
overview: Turbican is an arcade game. The game takes place in the Dark Court. Turbican is a young spirit. Its role is to collect the five elements of Destruction Spell and use it to destroy the Statue of Evil Spirit. The ghost must leave the court floating on colorful balloons. The mansion consists of thirty chambers on four floors and an elevator. Turbican can walk to the right, left, jump and collect needed items such as keys and spell elements.
